summary:
A highly accomplished and passionate education professional with expertise in pedagogy, curriculum development and education psychology , who employs a holistic approach to combine proven strategies, practical tools, and compassionate guidance to support individuals in their personal, educational and professional growth journey.

Specific capabilities and interests:
-  Empathetic and well developed communication skills
- Analytical and structured in work approach
- Program development and writing skills 
- Life coach for adults and children
- Training, facilitation 
- Developing strategies and plans 
working with families and children
